name: Sneaky Drifty Race
description:
LD41 "Combine 2 incompatible genres"

Combining stealth and racing.   Do 3 laps of each track and avoid the drones.

1 or 2 players... Player 1: WASD, Player 2: IJKL

Enter skips the current level, Escape restarts the current level

--

Credits / Tools Used:

  • Game Maker Studio 2
  • GIMP
  • ChipTone http://sfbgames.com/chiptone
  • Ionicsmusic http://www.ionicsmusic.com/ announcer sounds:
    •  "RaceRobot - first place" https://freesound.org/people/Ionicsmusic/sounds/196864/
    •  "RaceRobot - second place" https://freesound.org/people/Ionicsmusic/sounds/196860/
    •  "RaceRobot - final lap" https://freesound.org/people/Ionicsmusic/sounds/196891/
